Articles.Content: when i updated ksp I went to download and install a planet pack. i did what i was supposed to (downloading the latest version of kopernicus putting the files in the gamedata folder etc), but when i play the game none of the planets change, i am stuck with the stock planets. is anyone else experiencing this problem and does anyone have a solution? (note: i have tried at least 5 different packs none of them working)
Modding question moved to the modding subforum. Good luck with it.

Planet mods require Kopernicus, which has not yet been updated for 1.2.  So until it is, all planet mods are on hold.

Edited October 17, 2016 by Laguna
